How to build Probatron.NET from source

= Introduction =

  # Download the source code from [http://foo.com here].
  # Download SAXON for .NET from [http://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/saxon/saxonb9-1-0-6n.zip here].
  # Create a new project in your favourite .NET IDE and import the source code. The required dependencies are included in the SAXON for .NET distribution.
